The Lord of the Rings: name=The Lord of the Rings: War of the Ring

}}'''The Lord of the Rings: War of the Ring''' is a 2003 real-time strategy game developed by [[Liquid Entertainment]] and published by [[Sierra Entertainment]]. It expands upon the events of the [[War of the Ring]].

{{disambig-more: ''War of the Ring'' is based solely on the books, not the [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)
The Lord of the Rings: films]] by [[Peter Jackson]]. Thus, characters like [[Legolas]] and [[Aragorn]] look and sound different from their counterparts as depicted in the films and the game. The game is officially licensed by [[Middle-earth Enterprises

{{disambig-more: Actors are not credited by role.
{{DEFAULTSORT:Lord of the Rings War of the Ring}}
